amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove the Federal mandate of "not less than 30%" for principal forgiveness and allow States to provide such forgiveness at a rate of "30% or less" when dealing with funds made available under the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike "not less that 30 percent" and insert "30 percent or less".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lankford amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 263 (Roll no. 666).
